DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Constructed Nature
Traits.Content: This golem does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Traits.Name: Siege Monster
Traits.Content: The Asphalt Golem deals double damage to objects and structures.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Asphalt Golem can make two attacks: one with its Asphalt Slam and one with its Tar Blast.

Actions.Name: Asphalt Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Tar Blast
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) acid damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or have its speed reduced by half until the end of its next turn as it struggles to move through the viscous tar.

Actions.Name: Molten Puddle
Actions.Content: The Asphalt Golem creates a 10-foot radius puddle of molten tar in an unoccupied space within 30 feet. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (4d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save is also immobilized until the end of its next turn. This ability recharges on a roll of 5-6 on a d6.
